name: The Last Sapling (Cozy)
description:
A parasite has plagued the forest, corrupting the natural world. You are the last sapling left, holding the seed for the future of your species.

The Last Sapling is a 2D platformer game, where you play as a pixelated sapling trying to escape a small maze-like level, movement options are limited to just horizontal motions and the main movement component is the seed object the Sapling carries along that lets the Sapling teleport to the current location of the sapling.

Controls are :

A - Left

D- Right

Hold Left Mouse Button: Aims the Seed ( release to fire)

Right Mouse Button: Teleport to seed Location

**This Game was made as a submission to the Global Game Jam 2023.**

Creators of the Game:

Artists: Jesse Israel && Connor McDonald

Designers: Anthony Polidura && DeVon Adams

Programmers: Kosi Chima && Milo Wilson && Navonte Riggin

Music by : bluegestalt (Andrea Baroni)

Sound Effects: Red Button Audio

Thank you for Playing!
